page.title: 21Bear Hotel
page.content:
The Bear Hotel, formerly the Bear's Head has now gone, and in it's place is Bear Lanes Shopping centre which houses various shops and offices. The facade remains in the same tudor style and is the entrance to the shopping centre. In existence since 1768, The Bearâ€™s back yard hosted strolling theatrical players in the early 19th century. Robert Owen, the social reformer, died there in 1858.
